rows.label: qst104904_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh... A handsome gentleman is brightly
illuminating this dim room...!

rows.label: qst104904_msg0002
rows.name: My apologies. I got carried away...

rows.label: qst104904_msg0003
rows.name:
It's about my thanks for the
ice flowers, right? Of course,
I haven't forgotten...

rows.label: qst104904_msg0004
rows.name:
But could I ask you to do
just a little more for me?

rows.label: qst104904_msg0005
rows.name:
As I mentioned before, I'm
planning to make a book
about beautiful flowers.

rows.label: qst104904_msg0006
rows.name:
I was thinking of just putting
together beautiful flowers
and beautiful scenery...

rows.label: qst104904_msg0008
rows.name:
The book I want to make is about the
scenery woven by beautiful things
together! A fabulous situation!!

rows.label: qst104904_msg0009
rows.name:
To create such a book, I would
like your beautiful cooperation!

rows.label: qst104904_msg0010
rows.name: Thank you! Thank you so much~~!!

rows.label: qst104904_msg0011
rows.name:
Then, please defeat the Jairo
Leopards near the Luminaria Arch~

rows.label: qst104904_msg0012
rows.name:
Please tell me in detail how the
handsome gentleman fights the beautiful
beast in the beautiful snowfield~

rows.label: qst104904_msg0101
rows.name:
Uhm, well... I'd like to speak
with the handsome gentleman...
